cleMinistereEducatif.description: TODO API V2: move inside training<ILbaItemTraining>

info.title: La bonne alternance
info.description: Trouvez ici les formations en alternance et les entreprises qui recrutent régulièrement en alternance

get.description: Get existing establishment id from siret & email

post.description:
Create an establishment entity.
origin parameter is always prefixed with you identification name declared at the API user creation.
it is a string in tiny case of your organism name. example: BETA GOUV with an origin set to "campaign2023" will be betagouv-campaign2023.

get.description: Get all jobs related to my organization

parameters.description: mongodb query allowing specific filtering, JSON stringified.
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: fields to return, ex {_id: 1, first_name:1, last_name:0}
parameters.name: select

parameters.description: the limit of results per page
parameters.name: limit

post.description:
Create a job offer inside an establishment entity.
An establishment ID entity is required.

patch.description:
Update a job offer specific fields inside an establishment entity.
A job ID is required.

get.description:
Get related training organization related to a job offer.
A job ID is required

post.description:
Create delegation related to a job offer.
A job ID and a list of establishment IDs are required

Update a job offer status to "Provided".
A job ID is required

Update a job offer status to "Canceled".
A job ID is required

Update a job expiration date by 30 days.
A job ID is required

get.description: Get job opportunities matching the query parameters

parameters.description: some rome codes separated by commas
parameters.name: romes

parameters.description: the referer provided in the HTTP query headers
parameters.name: referer

parameters.description: optional: comma separated list of job opportunities sources
parameters.name: sources

parameters.description: optional: filter opportunities on opco name
parameters.name: opco

parameters.description: optional: filter opportunities on opco url
parameters.name: opcoUrl

get.description: Get one company identified by it's siret

parameters.description: the siret number of the company looked for.
parameters.name: siret

parameters.description: the referer provided in the HTTP query headers
parameters.name: referer

get.description: Get one lba job identified by it's id

parameters.description: the id the lba job looked for.
parameters.name: id

post.description: Notifies that the detail of a matcha job has been viewed

parameters.description: the id the lba job looked for.
parameters.name: id

get.description: Get one pe job identified by it's id

parameters.description: the id the pe job looked for.
parameters.name: id

Retourne la liste des métiers associé à un établissment identifié par son siret dans le chemin de l'appel
Retourne la liste de tous les métiers référencés sur LBA
